page.title: 03The Pre-school Play Groups
page.content: There are three playgroups.Their purpose is to enable children to work and play together before they reach school age. It also gives the mums a chance to chat and have a break. At the pavillion there are fourteen children altogether, It starts at 9.10 and finishes at 11.45. They have plasticene, a lot of the children make things, they dress up as kings and queens, make pictures with paints,do puzzles and play; also helpers read books to them. We went to John Hampden Play Group, they have been going for four years and Chapel Lane Play Group for nine years. There are twenty-eight toddlers meet in the old chapel. We think playgroups are very useful.
